title: How I Feel About Season 3 & My History with Toxic Relationships
itunes:title: How I Feel About Season 3 & My History with Toxic Relationships
description:
In this episode, Kimberly Cobb opens up about toxic relationships of her past, talks about signs to look out for, and gives advice for others on how to get out of a toxic relationship. She also recaps her time with best friend Danielle visiting her in Austin, opens up about Season 3, and more!

 

Follow for weekly episodes of the "My Lips Aren't Sealed" podcast, where I discuss fashion, entertainment, travel tips, dating tips, pop culture, and more from my life! Thanks for listening!
